description: Centralized, tunable governance constants for GAX and GSEP-C.

P01_Normalization_Bias.context: Value added to the denominator of the COF to prevent division by zero (1.1).

Viability_Margin_Minimum.context: Absolute minimum required for the dynamic viability margin (epsilon), protecting against low risk/low benefit transitions.

L1_Policy_Veto_Threshold.context: The threshold value (relative or absolute, depending on implementation) that triggers S-03 (CRITICAL POLICY VIOLATION) in L1.
